name: Dungeon Master (itch) (HoleyCheese)
description:
Dungeon Master is a fast-paced 2D platformer where the player has control over aspects of the dungeon like gravity and traps to help fight off hordes of enemies and escape the dungeon.

Taking place in a poorly balanced MMORPG dungeon, adventurers have access to overpowered pay-to-win weapons that can kill the final boss in a single hit. The boss has grown quite tired of contending with the never ending onslaught of overpowered players and has decided to start a new life. The player assumes control of said final boss in their quest to escape the dungeon once and for all.

Credits

Developers - Sehaj Singh Kalra, Isa Ito, Lilian Chee

Assets used:
  • Lava Caves Tileset by  Namatnieks
  • Martial Hero by LuizMelo
  • Knight Character by RGS_Dev
  • Sounds from freesound.org
